EmailTemplate.description: Thank you for your interest in the College of Liberal Arts and Sciences
EmailTemplate.name: Psychology template
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your interest in the College Liberal Arts and Sciences
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting the department of Psychology at ASU, We do not have brochures to mail out that pertain to the Psychology program. Please visit the Psychology web site at https://psychology.clas.asu.edu/graduate . We offer 6 areas of study for you to choose from. If you have specific program questions please feel free to ask.
Have a wonderful day,
Sno Kleespies Graduate Studies Coordinator Psychology Dept.
480-965-7606 Phone 480-965-8544 Fax Mail Code 1104
